name: static-site
description: Simple static site with markdown support

scripts.serve: node -e "require('http').createServer((req, res) => require('fs').readFile('public' + (req.url === '/' ? '/index.html' : req.url), (err, data) => { if (err) { res.writeHead(404); res.end(); } else { res.writeHead(200); res.end(data); } })).listen(3000);"
